document.full_text: hundreds of syrians chanted "freedom" as they gathered late saturday in the damascus suburb of douma to receive protesters wounded when they confronted security forces the day before, a witness said.
document.title: syrians chant "freedom," receive wounded in suburb
lines_and_colors: hundreds of syrians chanted "freedom" as they gathered late saturday in the damascus suburb of douma to receive protesters wounded when they confronted security forces the day before, a witness said.
